definition: The term refers to an action or event that occurs at the same time as another action or event. It is commonly used in the context of describing activities or situations that happen simultaneously, often in relation to multiple individuals or objects.

examples.english: The event will be simultaneously translated.

examples.german: Die Präsentation wurde simultan auf mehreren Bildschirmen gezeigt.
examples.english: The presentation was shown simultaneously on multiple screens.

examples.german: Die Konferenz wird simultan in mehreren Sprachen abgehalten.
examples.english: The conference will be held simultaneously in multiple languages.
